definition: to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Do you see that girl with blonde highlights?
sentences.chinese: 你看见那个挑染金色头发的女孩吗？

sentences.english: They took a pen thing and literally highlighted my hair.
sentences.chinese: 他们用一种笔形的事物一点点儿地挑染我的头发。

sentences.english: Do you think I can get some highlights today, too?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我今天也可以挑染吗？

sentences.english: I want to get some highlights today, and I've always wanted to get my hair dyed red.
sentences.chinese: 我今天想做个挑染，我一直就想把头发染成红色。
能给我头发挑染一下吗？

sentences.english: You've had a trim and highlighted your hair.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发修剪过，还挑染了呢。

sentences.english: Intricate highlighting is very popular now.

definition: level with one's shoulders/(of two people) both the same height
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
